### SazonIa

SazonIa is a social network for chefs and food enthusiasts. It allows users to share recipes, follow other users, and receive recipe recommendations generated by OpenAI. The application is built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js) and uses JWT for authentication.

## Database Schema

```sql
-- Create the database 
-- auto-generated definition
create table configuration
(
    configId    int auto_increment
        primary key,
    image_url   varchar(255) null,
    picture_id  varchar(255) null,
    upload_time datetime(6)  null,
    user_id     int          null,
    constraint UKb8kffyvx6oyikobkuhurb1slu
        unique (user_id),
    constraint FK5u3jsr211iwxnybkb9fn9m1lr
        foreign key (user_id) references user (user_id)
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table user
(
    user_id          int auto_increment
        primary key,
    birth_date       date         not null,
    email            varchar(255) not null,
    last_name_mother varchar(255) not null,
    first_name       varchar(255) not null,
    password         varchar(255) not null,
    last_name_father varchar(255) not null,
    phone_number     varchar(255) not null,
    constraint UKob8kqyqqgmefl0aco34akdtpe
        unique (email)
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table user_follower
(
    user_id     int not null,
    follower_id int not null,
    primary key (follower_id, user_id),
    constraint FK7lyufbui36w4jul3ml7p4k5ar
        foreign key (user_id) references user (user_id),
    constraint FKajyerhakvce24jhhr0fcf80fx
        foreign key (follower_id) references user (user_id)
);

-- insert data into the tables
```
